description.value: A vocabulary that specifies the source of consent where the patient lacks mental capacity and consent has been provided by a third party with the appropriate legal status.

requirements.value: There is a requirement within the Social Care ADW message to indicate the source of the third party consent, if it has been necessary to obtain this.
